news.title: What we know about the ceasefire
news.summary: Donald Trump accuses both sides of breaking the ceasefire and urges them to "calm down".

news.title: Keir Starmer vows to press on with welfare cuts as rebellion grows
news.summary: More than 120 Labour MPs are backing plans to block cuts to disability and sickness-related benefits.

news.title: Russian naval ship 'disguised' itself while passing through English Channel
news.summary: The Boikiy emitted a fake ID signal while sailing through the waterway alongside two sanctioned oil tankers.

news.title: 'A slap in the face' - Asos bans shoppers for making too many returns
news.summary: The retailer has been cracking down on customers with high return rates - but some say it is unfair.

news.title: UK must prepare for war scenario, government warns
news.summary: A strategy document says an "all-of-society effort" is required to make the UK more secure.

news.title: British man charged over 'wedding' with child, 9, at Disneyland Paris
news.summary: The 39-year-old is a convicted sexual offender who is wanted in the UK, French prosecutors have said.

news.title: Venice protesters claim victory as Bezos changes wedding venue
news.summary: No Space for Bezos activist group tells BBC they are "very proud of this".

news.title: Man accused of hiring Â£1,500 'hitman' to kill wife
news.summary: Paul Lewis, 54, and Dominique Saunders, 35, deny conspiracy to murder at Swansea Crown Court

news.title: Bears raid honey store after enclosure escape sparks wildlife park evacuation
news.summary: Two brown bears escape from their enclosure and eat a "week's worth of honey" in the food store.

news.title: Rich Kids of Instagram star admits Hermes handbags scam
news.summary: Jack Watkin, 26, gained his victims' trust by creating a false image of wealth and sophistication.
